We can add even more text here to see how this text will apeat on our card. see the map Pin on map logo // This is the public application ID provided by Google for demo purposes ca-app-pub-3940256099942544/6300978111 Center the map Name of the office Office description Download file Info About About Foreigners in Bydgoszcz App Foreigners in Bydgoszcz App is created for foreigners living in Bydgoszcz, to help them make themselves comfortable in their new city.
